title: Bad boys (and girl) of the summer Saeima session named
summary_full: Six members of the 14th Saeima were held administratively liable between the end of April and September of this year, mainly for road traffic offences, the Mandates, Ethics and Submissions Committee reported to the Saeima on Thursday, November 13th.
